Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
Reservation
Transaction
public class Transaction extends Reservation
Extending the Reservation class, this class handles the transactions between customer and VisitAir, including payments and refunds
Date: 4/17/2025 (last modified)

  • Constructor Details

    • Transaction

      public Transaction(double price)
      Constructor to make a transaction, using the constructor in Reservation. This constructor also gives new fields, being price, the balance of a user, whether the transaction was validated and approved (both booleans) and type of transaction this was
      Parameters:
      price - the price the user is about to pay
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the price to be payed isn't positive

  • Method Details

    • setValidation

      public void setValidation(boolean newValidation)
      Setter method to validate a transaction
      Parameters:
      newValidation - a boolean to determine whether the transaction was validated or not

    • charge

      public String charge(double paidAmount)
      Takes away money from the user once a transaction is made
      Parameters:
      paidAmount - the amount of money to charge the user
      Returns:
      a string either telling the user that the payment was successful alond with change, or that they don't have enough money along with how much more they need
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the amount to be paid is negative

    • setTransactionType

      public void setTransactionType(String requestedType)
      Sets the type of transaction (which interaction between Visitair and user)
      Parameters:
      requestedType - the type of transaction to occur
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the entered type of transaction isn't something VisitAir does

    • refund

      public String refund(double amount)
      Refunds a customer for an amount they already payed after cancellation
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount the customer payed/is being payed back
      Returns:
      a string stating how much has been refunded and the amount if this.approved==true, or a statement that the refund has been denied if not
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when amount to be refunded isn't a positive number

    • displayTransactionInfo

      public void displayTransactionInfo()
      Prints out all of the details regarding the transaction and the balance the customer has after the transaction

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
